vision: A companion MCP server and CLI for Agent Forge that records structured memory during task execution, enables seamless /clear recovery, and monitors for context drift with graduated intervention.

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project setup, dependencies, core data schema, file-based storage engine, sliding window manager, and configuration module.

milestones.name: Core Infrastructure Complete
milestones.description: Data models defined, storage engine operational, sliding window enforced, configuration loading works.

phases.name: Core MCP Tools
phases.description: FastMCP server bootstrap and all recording tools: record_step, record_decision, record_file, record_branch, task lifecycle management, and markdown summary generation.

milestones.name: MCP Server with Recording Tools
milestones.description: MCP server running with all 6 core recording tools functional. Tasks can be started, recorded, and completed via MCP.

phases.name: Recovery and CLI
phases.description: Recovery context tool for post-/clear resumption, alignment checking tool, and developer-facing Click CLI with status, show, and list commands.

milestones.name: Recovery Context and Developer CLI
milestones.description: After /clear, get_recovery_context returns full task context. Developer CLI shows memory status, task details, and task history.

phases.name: Agent Forge Integration
phases.description: Hook integration for automatic recording, pipeline state file readers, post-clear recovery workflow, and end-to-end integration testing.

milestones.name: Full Pipeline Integration
milestones.description: Memory recording works automatically during Agent Forge pipeline execution via hooks. Full recovery workflow operational. Integration tests pass.

phases.name: Drift Detection and Intervention
phases.description: Plan drift detection, error loop detection, confusion pattern detection, scope creep detection, and graduated intervention system.

milestones.name: Active Quality Guardian
milestones.description: Drift detection catches error loops (3+ failures) and wrong-file edits. Graduated intervention warns on first detection, suggests auto-clear on second.

phases.name: Enhancement
phases.description: Memory analytics, developer review dashboard, memory export/import, and cross-project memory capabilities.

milestones.name: Advanced Features Complete
milestones.description: Analytics provide actionable insights across tasks. Dashboard gives developers full visibility. Export/import enables context sharing.
